© 2011 by István Koren

This is not an official application of "Studentenwerk Dresden". All it does is displaying the official RSS 2.0 newsfeed of the cafeterias in a nice way.
Feedback is very much appreciated, please send comments to:
istvank.apps@gmx.net

This software is Open Source under Apache 2.0 license! Feel free to download the code and implement your own version for your local cafeteria:
https://github.com/istvank/MensaDD
